name: Grace of Zordan
description: Tactical-strategic turn-based card game, the key focus is on the player's ability to assess the situation and control the battlefield.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4600 or AMD Athlon II P340 Dual Core Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 615 or Radeon 6600M DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 or AMD Athlon II X4 641 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti or Radeon RX 550, or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
